pageContext.claim: â€œWhen I decided to go to Ohio for Troy Balderson, he was down in early voting 64 to 36. That was not good. After my speech on Saturday night, there was a big turn for the better. Now Troy wins a great victory during a very tough time of the year for voting. He will win BIG in Nov......Congratulations to Troy Balderson on a great win in Ohio. A very special and important race!
pageContext.analysis: Trump congratulated Balderson while the race was still too close to call. No major network had named him the winner.
